alert.note: Alert for Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greene and south central Clay Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 950 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crowleys Ridge State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Rector, Marmaduke, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Lafe, Knobel, Walcott, Beech Grove, Stonewall, Heubner, Schug, Tipperary, Fritz, Bard, Mounds, Halliday, Leonard, Bethel and Finch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
